column2: Authors of a recent study (13) reported the clinical and computed tomographic features of benign P neumatosis intestinalis in pediatric hematopoietic stem cell transplant and oncology patients. McCarville MB, Whittle SB, Goodin GS, et al. Clinical and computed tomographic features of benign pneumatosis intestinalis in pediatric hematopoietic stem cell transplant and oncology patients.
